article: , When I was growing up, I had an old neighbor Dr Gibbs, a good doctor. When Dr, Gibbs wasn't _ lives, he was planting trees. He meant that deep roots had to be _ . For this reason, he _ watered his trees. Dr Gibbs _ a couple of years after I left home. Every now and again, I walked by his house and looked at the _ that he had planted when he was alive. They're extremely tall and big _ they have deep roots now. Every night before I go to bed, I check on my two sons. Mostly I pray that their lives will be _ .But I think that it's time to _ my prayer because now I know my children are going to _ hardship.
